channel.title: Couple of questions
channel.description:
Hi there, correct me if im in the wrong section, Im looking for a rsc model recolourer, I have one atm, but when you save the image, it doesnt save it with the colour overlay, Im doing this because im making a basic rsc in visual basic 6, and im making tilesets. The pngs/sprites are all done in white and the armors done in steel from what I've gathered, If anyone could post a link to a program and also, or even better, the RGB values of Bronze,iron,mith,addy,black, dragon ect
Thanks

item.title: Couple of questions
item.dc:creator: @martinfin martinfin
item.description:
@martinfin wrote:

I’d rep+ if I could Zilent… Nice teaching…

Read full topic

item.title: Couple of questions
item.dc:creator: @Zilent Zilent
item.description:
@Zilent wrote:

Decimal: 16737817

Hex:
FF | 66 | 19
R | G | B

No-one cares about octal

11111111 | 01100110 | 00011001

(byte)value = Blue
shift 8 bits you get Green
shift 16 bits you get Red

Read full topic

item.title: Couple of questions
item.dc:creator: @dimebagx dimebagx
item.description:
@dimebagx wrote:

Okay,

I got into the file, But the values don’t seem right, could you correct these?

BRONZE: 16737817
IRON: 15654365
STEEL: 15658734
BLACK 3158064
MITHRIL: 10072780
ADAMANTITE: 11717785
RUNITE: 65535
DRAGON: 16711748

RGB values only go up to 255?, RGB(0-255, 0-255, 0-255)

Read full topic

item.title: Couple of questions
item.dc:creator: @KO9 KO9
item.description:
@KO9 wrote:

I think the RGB values are in the Items.rscd file if not the Animations.rscd one

Read full topic
